name: CowSim
description: Welcome, my journey began in January when i decided to learn Unreal Engine 4. CowSim is my first project that is created to help jump start the learning curve of cattle handling. This is my first project and there is a lot that will be improved and upgraded. Right now the cattle do not act in a herd mentality, rather they are all individually designed to have different stress levels. the goal of the edugame is to minimize stress and maximize efficiency.
